titles.title: To extend the time period prior to the need for workers for the filing of applications for temporary labor certification in the processing of alien labor certification applications.
To extend the time period prior to the need for workers for the filing of applications for temporary labor certification in the processing of alien labor certification applications.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: Allows applications for alien labor certifications for temporary nonagricultural occupations to be filed with appropriate employment agencies up to 180 days before workers are needed.
